Jen Haines
Full Stack Developer - Frontend - User Experience Designer

About

Working with technology for many years has given me a unique perspective on "how things work" from the inside out. I've worn many hats in IT from Technical Support and hardware to building database and business applications. No matter what I have accomplished I've always longed to get back to my true love of building and troubleshooting apps.

Currently my specialities are in Ruby on Rails, and Javascript platforms such as Node.js, Jquery, and Angular. I also love my cats Perl and Maisy and to ride my motorcycle fast. I also enjoy recording music and playing my guitar and pretending to be a "Rock Star" when I find the time.

Around the Web

Thank You

Jekyll and Start Bootstrap for helping me create this site.

Copyright © Jen C. Haines 2015

Pong

Pure HTML5 version of the classic arcade game Pong. The game is for one player versus an AI player.

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: October 2015
  • Service: Games
Live Preview view in Github Close

Bloccit

Real live Rails-based Reddit clone.

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: November 2014
  • Service: Social App
Live Preview view in Github Close

BlocitOff

Basic to do list. Both Rails and Angular!

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: November 2014
  • Service: Productivity
Live Preview view in Github Close

Bloc Jams

Angular based Spotify clone!

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: April 2015
  • Service: Music
Live Preview view in Github Close

BlocMarks

Blocmarks allows a user to bookmark URLs via email, peruse other user's bookmarks and maintain a personal index of categorized bookmarks.

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: January 2015
  • Service: Rails Social App
Live Preview view in Github Close

Metrix

Analytics API!

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: Feb. 2015
  • Service: Business
Live Preview view in Github Close

PowerTimer

Angular-based Pomodoro Timer with To do list!

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: August 2015
  • Service: Productivity
Live Preview view in Github Close

Simplechat

Basic Angularfire Chatroom!

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: July 2015
  • Service: Social
Live Preview view in Github Close

Wikibloc

Rails-based Wikipedia clone!

  • Client: Bloc
  • Date: January 2015
  • Service: Social
Live Preview view in Github Close
